prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon with fluffy ears and a long, curly tail.
Show me a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a small rodent with big eyes.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a silvery-gray body and playful personality traits.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to play and often hides in grasslands.
Design a Pokemon that has a soft fur texture and is known for its speed.
Give me a Pokemon that is commonly found in urban areas and enjoys companionship.
Make a Pokemon that has a distinct, bushy tail and a cheerful expression.
